TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You receive a computer disc with SHODAN on it >:[)

I want a miniature Vexx to gaurd my computer at night.

Granted, but he goes through all your files and judges you in the morning.

I wish I could read fast.

Granted, but you can't remember a single word.

I wish I had a long pointy stick.

Granted, but it's pointy at the wrong end.

I wish I had a potato battery

It's dead.

I wish fora combustible lemon.

Granted, but it only burns for a second or two before the combustible skin is consumed, and then sputters out as the fire reaches the still-moist centre. The smoke and small amount of liquid sent flying as it sputters out somehow manage to spray you directly in the eye. You die shortly afterward; the lemon was sabotaged, and poisoned.

I wish for a blue taco.

Granted, it's dyed with methyl blue.

I wish for a lemon battery

Granted. It is useless!

I wish that I can wear the hat in Boosterspice's avatar.

The hat fuses to your head, slowly working its way downward, until your entire head is replaced by the hat.

I wish for more riddles.

Granted, but it's an old one, since I haven't the time to think up a new one just yet.

I wish people weren't so demanding.

No one ever asks for anything, ever again, and your life becomes the living essence of boredom.

I wish for food.

Granted. It's the one thing you hate

I wish my hat was the coolest in the universe

granted. it is cooled to above absolute zero

i wish that i could decide on what avatar i should use

Granted, but it's unsupported in this forum. (shouldn't that be below absolute zero, or do I get it wrong?)

I wish that I don't wish

Granted. The paradox kills everything ever.

I wish for a notebook.

Granted. You write your name in it, to claim ownership of it, and you die. You have inadvertently discovered the Death Note. Millions will die when that book is inevitably found by another.

I wish people were more careful with where they write their names...

Granted, their writing is so careful its perfect even on printer paper.(Can't corrupt that one:P)

I wish my brother was a little kinder to me.

Granted, he is so kind he hugs you so much you die of lack of oxygen.

I wish

granted, the word shall never know what you wished for

i wish that my seat was more comfortable

Granted. You never leave it again, and die of hunger.

I wish the next poster couldn't make a wish.

Granted; I may not speak a wish out loud.

Too bad we're writing, eh? I wish the person would stop.

Granted, but i go on.

I wish my Mentlegens listened to me.

Granted, but they don't respond.

I wish that the Universal Constants (like the gravitational constant) were not constants.

Granted. The universe gives you a BSoD.

I wish for K10 Deluxe Heavy Lifter, maxed out.

Granted but i have no idea what it is so enjoy your paper with k10 deluxe heavy lifter written in maxed out font on it.

I wish for something i have no name for.

Edited February 7, 2014 by MC.STEEL
